# Card Container

## Usage:

```html
<p-card-container>
    <!-- Content -->
</p-card-container>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                         | Type      | Default |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `hoverable` | `hoverable` | Wether the card should be hoverable | `boolean` | `false` |
